verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* answering \w Job|strong="H0347"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* whirlwind, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:
Gird up thy loins \w like|strong="H5973"\w* \w a|strong="H3198"\w* \w man|strong="H6030"\w*: I will ask thee, \w and|strong="H5973"\w* do thou tell \w me|strong="H5973"\w*.
Wilt thou make void \w my|strong="H3068"\w* judgment: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* condemn \w me|strong="H6030"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* thou mayst \w be|strong="H3068"\w* justified?

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* hast thou \w an|strong="H7760"\w* \w arm|strong="H3027"\w* \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* canst thou thunder \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* voice \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*?

Clothe thyself \w with|strong="H1696"\w* beauty, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* set thyself up \w on|strong="H0259"\w* high \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* glorious, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* put \w on|strong="H0259"\w* goodly garments.

Scatter \w the|strong="H0853"\w* proud \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thy indignation, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* behold every arrogant \w man|strong="H6030"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* humble \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w Look|strong="H4994"\w* \w on|strong="H1397"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* proud, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* confound \w them|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* crush \w the|strong="H3045"\w* wicked \w in|strong="H3045"\w* \w their|strong="H3045"\w* place.
Hide \w them|strong="H4616"\w* \w in|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H6663"\w* dust together, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* plunge their faces \w into|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H6663"\w* pit.
Then \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H0410"\w* confess \w that|strong="H0518"\w* thy right hand \w is|strong="H0410"\w* able \w to|strong="H0518"\w* save thee.
Behold behemoth whom I made \w with|strong="H3847"\w* thee, he eateth grass like an ox.

\w His|strong="H3605"\w* strength \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* loins, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* force \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* navel \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* belly.

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* setteth \w up|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* tail \w like|strong="H8478"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* cedar, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sinews \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* testicles \w are|strong="H7563"\w* wrapped \w together|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w His|strong="H6440"\w* bones \w are|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* pipes \w of|strong="H6440"\w* brass, \w his|strong="H6440"\w* gristle \w like|strong="H6440"\w* plates \w of|strong="H6440"\w* iron.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* beginning \w of|strong="H3225"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ways \w of|strong="H3225"\w* God, \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H1571"\w* \w him|strong="H3588"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* apply \w his|strong="H3588"\w* sword.

\w To|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* mountains bring forth \w grass|strong="H2682"\w*: \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w all|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* field \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* play.

\w He|strong="H0202"\w* sleepeth under \w the|strong="H2009"\w* shadow, \w in|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* covert \w of|strong="H4975"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* reed, \w and|strong="H4975"\w* \w in|strong="H4994"\w* moist places.
\w The|strong="H3644"\w* shades cover his shadow, \w the|strong="H3644"\w* willows \w of|strong="H0730"\w* \w the|strong="H3644"\w* brook shall compass \w him|strong="H3644"\w* about.
Behold, he \w will|strong="H6106"\w* drink up a river, \w and|strong="H1270"\w* not wonder: \w and|strong="H1270"\w* he trusteth that the Jordan may run into his mouth.

\w In|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H1931"\w* eyes \w as|strong="H0410"\w* \w with|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H5066"\w* hook \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* take \w him|strong="H1931"\w*, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* bore \w through|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H1931"\w* nostrils \w with|strong="H1870"\w* stakes.

Canst thou draw \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* leviathan \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* hook, \w or|strong="H7704"\w* canst thou tie \w his|strong="H3605"\w* tongue \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* cord?
Canst thou put \w a|strong="H8478"\w* ring \w in|strong="H7901"\w* \w his|strong="H8478"\w* nose, or bore through \w his|strong="H8478"\w* jaw \w with|strong="H7901"\w* \w a|strong="H8478"\w* buckle?
Will \w he|strong="H6628"\w* \w make|strong="H5437"\w* many supplications \w to|strong="H5437"\w* thee, or speak soft words \w to|strong="H5437"\w* thee?

\w Will|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* wilt thou take \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* servant \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever?

Shalt thou play \w with|strong="H0639"\w* \w him|strong="H3947"\w* \w as|strong="H3947"\w* \w with|strong="H0639"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* bird, or tie \w him|strong="H3947"\w* up \w for|strong="H5869"\w* thy handmaids?
\w Shall|strong="H3956"\w* friends cut \w him|strong="H4900"\w* \w in|strong="H3882"\w* pieces, \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* merchants divide \w him|strong="H4900"\w*?

Wilt thou fill nets \w with|strong="H0639"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* skin, \w and|strong="H0639"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* cabins \w of|strong="H7760"\w* fishes \w with|strong="H0639"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* head?

Lay thy hand \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: remember \w the|strong="H0413"\w* battle, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w no|strong="H0518"\w* \w more|strong="H7235"\w*.

Behold \w his|strong="H3947"\w* hope \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* \w fail|strong="H3772"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* sight \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w all|strong="H5769"\w* \w he|strong="H1285"\w* \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H5769"\w* cast \w down|strong="H3772"\w*.
